titleText: Microsoft and Amazon agree to enable Cortana, Alexa communication
mainText: Microsoft and Amazon are partnering to enable their respective personal digital assistants to work together. In a deal announced on August 30, the pair committed to getting Microsoft's Cortana and Amazon's Alexa assistants to communicate with…

titleText: Amazon and Microsoft agree their voice assistants will talk (to eachother)
mainText: Those betting big on AI being making voice the dominant user interface of the future are not betting so big as to believe their respective artificially intelligent voice assistants will be the sole vocal oracle… ‘Cortana, Open Alexa,’ Amazon Says.
